stories.title: The ADA lawsuit settlement involving an accessibility overlay

stories.text:
Between Oct 27th and Oct 28th the HTML code for HN's front page changed from:

Oct 27th: <a href="hide?id=29010103&goto=news">hide</a> | <a href="item?id=29010103">18 comments</a>

Oct 28th: <a href="hide?id=29022887&goto=news">hide</a><a href="item?id=29022887"> | 31 comments</a>

The space and vertical bar between "hide" and the "XXX comments" is now part of the link for the comments.

Could it be fixed please? Thanks!

stories.text:
With the rise in remote working and the digital nomad lifestyle, what are your tricks for coping with unreliable Internet?

A couple I've come across: - Visual Studio has a Help Viewer that allows you to download offline versions of the docs - There are various ways to get offline backups of stack overflow (e.g. Stacked off)
stories.title: Ask HN: Developing .NET with poor/no Internet
